title: Land resource economics 2
overview: This course presents knowledge and skills to evaluate the current state of the land environment. It guides students through the development of the land market, explaining the formation process and economic relationships within the land market. Land Economics 2 focuses on analyzing economic issues in the use of various types of land such as urban land, agricultural land, and other specialized land types.

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to analyze the dynamics of the land market and its economic relationships.
Students will be able to evaluate the use of various types of land.
